name: Road Spies
description:
Original Browser Game by Silent Bay Studio

Credits to Tomysshadow for the standalone

Gameplay

Being an undercover agent is really tough. And with bullets flying around, you will need serious skills in driving in this 3D driving game called Road Spies. The objective here is to accept different missions in the city. There are 4 modes of mission you will encounter; Catch Up, Attack, Survival, and Runaway. Each mission has their own set of rules you must follow. The Survival mode is where you must drive and avoid crashing until you reach the escape zone. Each mission allows you to use guns to fight the enemy cars. You will earn money when you succeed and you can buy new spy cars for other missions.
